title: HELP. I cant reply to one comment helping me.
body:
RIOT GAMES SUPPORT PLEASE WORK. Now whenever I try to sign in on the support website** it comes up with a screen which shows that I need a verified email address**. It then sends an email to verify my email. Firstly**, I already have a verified email **but this doesn't matter because it's what I want to change. Secondly**, I'm just trying to sign in yet I keep on getting redirected to this**, also when I did try to sign in at one point the only server that was available to sign into was NA, I'm on OCE. 

P.S.** Riot I couldn't even reply to the only comment I got **which wasn't useful because of what I just stated. SO I had to make a new discussion just so that I could get help changing my email, If you don't know what  I'm talking about then go look at my previous discussion 'Help I want to get in the Alpha Client but it won't let me!'

replies.body: If you're having issues changing your email address, open a private window and create an account recovery ticket instead. They'll be able to help you even without access to your old email. Was that your question, or was it something else?

>
> If you're having issues changing your email address, open a private window and create an account recovery ticket instead. They'll be able to help you even without access to your old email. Was that your question, or was it something else?
